items.text: works it away through midwicket

there's a neeeeervous juggle, but he takes it in the end. Ambris at short midwicket this time as another Bangladesh player mis-hits a lofted shot. Soumya wants to get under the ball, nicely tossed up outside off, and clip it over the leg side field for a couple of runs, but the ball isn't quite as full as he thinks he is. It grips. it turns. It takes a leading edge and poof. He's gone

dismissal.text: Soumya Sarkar c Ambris b Nurse 54 (67b 4x4 2x6) SR: 80.59

items.text: goes round the wicket and nearly has him lbw as Mithun shuffles right across his crease to take a length ball on off stump and drop it past square leg

items.preText:
Rajat Saxena: "@Al Rafi Rusif - I agree, my four semifinalists for WC are India, England, Australia and Bangladesh. This Bangladesh team is very good on flat wickets."

Al Rafi Rusif: "May be this is the best Opportunity for Bangladesh to test their middle order depth in pressure situations. "
items.text: shifts back and nudges the length ball on middle to midwicket
items.shortText: Chase to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: drives smoothly to long-on
presses forward to the pitch of a tossed up offbreak and turns it behind square leg
ends up right across all three stumps again as he dinks a ball on middle and off stump behind square leg. Big lbw candidate
gets forward and blocks outside off, opening the face
items.shortText: Chase to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: defends a full delivery on off stump
items.shortText: Chase to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: works the flatter delivery on middle to deep midwicket

has Mithun been run out?! Oooh, it's close, but he's just in. Very risky run from Mushfiqur, but he likes to keep things ticking, especially after quick wickets. And though that's a good idea, dinking the ball so close to a very good fielder like Jonathan Carter at first slip is asking for trouble. He runs to his right, to where short point would be, dives head-first at the ball, grabs it with his right hand and then flicks it, while he's still suspended in the air, under his body at the keeper. Epic fielding skillz
sweeps through midwicket and sprints through for the second
rocks back and cuts the ball to deep point
works the ball through square leg
tosses it up on off stump from round the wicket, defends
items.shortText: Nurse to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.preText:
Trihan: "Now that the top order is back in the dressing room with still a lot of work to be done, this will be a test for the likes of Mithun and Sabbir. Hopefully Mushy and Mahmudullah will be around to guide them through!"

Will: "Once Nurse and Chase are out the way I can see Bangladesh knocking these off quite easily... assuming they don't lose another couple before they finish their overs!"
items.text: short and wide and Mushfiqur cracks it to the sweeper cover
outside edge as Allen has the batsman reaching outside the off stump with a little dip and a little turn.
items.shortText: Allen to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: good length, outside off, Mushfiqur leaves. Brave leave
items.postText: Abhijato: "WC Music: India (Alternative Rock: secured but innovative), England (EDM: Awesome and innovative but can be too much sometimes), Australia (Folk: traditional, re-emerging in recent times), West Indies (Ska: fallen out of charts), Afghanistan (Country: hits emerging here but has isolated mainstream artists), New Zealand (Absolutely Pop-ped last time ;), Sri Lanka and Bangladesh (pub music: amateur), SA (Electronica: like fine wine, relaxing) & Pakistan (HipHop: unpredictable and outrageous)!"
items.shortText: Allen to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: Mithun should have been run out. He goes for a reverse sweep and just sets off. Not realising Nurse is onto the ball quickly, moving to his left. Mushfiqur is aware of it though and, after taking a couple of steps forward, yells no and at that point, Mithun loses his footing and falls on his backside. He's stranded in the middle of the pitch with no way back. All Nurse has to do is lob the ball to the keeper... and he messes it up, sending it way over the keeper
items.shortText: Allen to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: full and outside off, he drives to long-off

items.shortText: Allen to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: goes back and cuts behind point
shortish and outside off, he goes for a cut, but only under-edges it on the bounce to the keeper
items.shortText: Nurse to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: steps down the pitch and lofts the length ball on middle straight over the bowler's head. He's doesn't get to the pitch of the ball but backed himself to pull it off
items.shortText: Nurse to Mohammad Mithun, SIX runs
